statewide_amendments.amendment: Colorado requires additional combustion air provisions for high-altitude installations above 5,000 feet

statewide_amendments.title: Venting
statewide_amendments.amendment: Special venting requirements for high-altitude areas

statewide_amendments.amendment: Minimum 30-inch working space required in front of equipment

general_requirements.requirement: Permit required for installation, replacement, or alteration of mechanical equipment
exemptions: Portable heating, cooling, or ventilation appliances
Replacement of parts that do not alter approval of equipment
Self-contained refrigeration systems containing 10 pounds or less of refrigerant

general_requirements.requirement: Rough-in inspection before concealment, final inspection after completion
Most of Colorado is above 5,000 feet elevation - affects equipment sizing and combustion air
general_requirements.notes: Consult manufacturer specifications for high-altitude derating
